content: lion lovey yarn circulo garro kids or any worsted weight yarn use any weight yarn with an appropriate sized needle gauge 16 sts and 22 row = 4 but gauge is not critical for this pattern since it s for a baby a firmer fabric is desirable to keep little fingers from getting stuck in holes needles size 8 circular needle long enough for magic loop or needle to obtain gauge or desired fabric characteristic directions cast on 6 stitches and join to work in the round using magic loop if using dpns treat the markers as the end of each needle set up rounds round 1 kfb around 12 sts round 2 k1 pm k3 pm k3 pm k3 pm k2 pattern rounds round 1 k to 1 st before marker kfb sm kfb* repeat to end of round 8 sts increased round 2 knit all stitches repeat row 1 and 2 until there are 160 stitches or about until 1 less than your desired length and size mine is about 7 before the border edge measured from the center to one of the sides not the corner edge round 1 k to 1 st before marker kfb sm kfb* repeat to end of round 8 sts increased round 2 purl all stitches repeat edge round 1 and 2 three more times for a total of 8 row 192 sts bind off loosely weave in ends attach head to body
